alert.note: Alert for Dougherty; Lee (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 4:29PM EDT until June 13 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Dougherty County in southwestern Georgia... Eastern Lee County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 429 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Leslie to near Putney, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Putney, Albany, Leesburg, East Albany, Marine Corps Logistics Base, Turner City, Chokee, Stocks, Radium Springs, Pecan City, Starksville, Acree, Williamsburg, Philema and Mossy Dell. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
